subNodes.conversationText: root
|Balen+Miki+Ian|Never thought I'd see this place again.
Not too far from here is the Mountain Dwarves' mines...
The last stand against Zorn's minions took place here.
Are we close to the exit to the Eastern Lands?
Yes, very close.  After the mines is the Tomb of the Dwarvern Leaders and then the Great Dwarven Cavern which exits to the Eastern Lands.
Miki, you look so much better in the dark.
Nice, so charming.  Unfortunately for me and my perfect infravision, I can still see your beastly face.
Ha, so you finally admit that you have been fixated on my countenance.
Give it up Ian, I'd rather kiss a dwarf...no offense Balen.
None taken, Miki.
So you have thought about kissing me?
I'm starting to feel nauseous...we've wasted enough time here...let's keep moving.
Let's keep moving then.
|Miki+Ian|I vaguely remember these caves.
We passed through here after leaving the dwarven mines.
I assume this would have been the location of the Last Stand against Zorn's creatures?
I believe so...
Miki, you look so much better in the dark.
Nice, so charming.  Unfortunately for me and my perfect infravision, I can still see your beastly face.
Ha, so you finally admit that you have been fixated on my countenance.
Give it up Ian, I'd rather kiss a troll.
So you have thought about kissing me?
I'm starting to feel nauseous...we've wasted enough time here...let's keep moving.
Shall we keep moving?
Yes, let's go...
|Fledge|I vaguely remember these caves.
We passed through here after leaving the dwarven mines.
I assume this would have been the location of the Last Stand against Zorn's creatures?
I believe so.  Shall we keep moving?
Yes, let's go...
